about_the_game:
Gear up for an extraordinary journey in the Superhero World! Soar into Superhero World and unveil new outfits, vehicles, jobs, properties, avatars, and more!

Unleash your inner hero as a Wonder Warrior, or harness the power of the stars as a Magical Girl while navigating on your Magical Scooter. Attend the Super Academy and train to become a Super Suit Designer or a Gadget Engineer, or dive straight away into the world of heroism as a Super-Pet Sitter or Sidekick!

Embark on a heroic journey through this extraordinary world, facing challenges in every corner. Navigate your way through the unpredictable mecha villain attacks in the city centre, protect the citizens of this world, and earn your spot in the Super Headquarters! Will you take higher risks following the bridge under the risky path, or play it safe cruising through the Underground Lair?

As you approach retirement, decide between the Heroes Resort or blast off as a Multiverse Traveller for intergalactic adventures! In the Superhero World, every decision propels you into a world of extraordinary possibilities!
